The claim was twisted and misrepresented: when in fact, U.S. Rep. Eric Swalwell called for banning possession of semiautomatic assault weapons.
Facebook flagged the story as part of it: indicating that the claim may not be authentic.
Swalwell: s actual proposal was to reinstate the federal assault weapons ban, prohibit manufacture and sales, buy back such weapons from law-abiding citizens, and criminally prosecute those who choose to defy the ban.
The NaturalNews story exaggerated Swalwe: s proposal by claiming that he wants door-to-door gun confiscation teams, which was not stated in his actual proposal.
